name: Woo
description:
Take some time to enjoy the wafting theremin and drink in the smells of worn upholstery. Also woo.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Thank you for playing my very first Unity game! If you enjoy your time with it or have any thoughts, please let me know in the comments. Woo too you, fine friend.

~~~~Credits~~~~

The beautiful theremin music is by Konstantin Kovalsky, and the particular track can be found here.
Assets from the free assets around the asset store, many thanks to all who put up their creations there for others to experiment with.
